thread.title_full: Varun Dhawan and Alia Bhatt promote 'Badrinath Ki Dulhania' like Dilliwallas! | Zee News

title: Varun Dhawan and Alia Bhatt promote 'Badrinath Ki Dulhania' like Dilliwallas! | Zee News
text:
Varun Dhawan and Alia Bhatt promote 'Badrinath Ki Dulhania' like Dilliwallas! By Ritika Handoo | Last Updated: Thursday, February 23, 2017 - 14:49 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: The quirky looking fun cast of Dharma Productions' next 'Badrinath Ki Dulhania' set the capital in full spirits. Varun Dhawan and Alia Bhatt have kickstarted the promotions of their upcoming venture and after enthralling the 'Jaipur' peeps, it's time now for Delhi! Related Gallery
